Make the Move to Hayes Lee Accountants

Fed up with slow responses, hidden fees, or outdated processes? Our switch-over team ensures a seamless transition of your bookkeeping and tax records, with zero downtime for your business.

Why Switch to Hayes Lee?

  • Rapid Onboarding: We handle data transfer from day one, so you stay focused on running your business.
  • Dedicated Transition Manager: One point of contact to answer all your questions and keep everything on track.
  • Proactive Advice: Personalized insights to optimize your cash flow and tax position from the moment we begin.
  • Smooth, Zero Disruption: Our proven process means no missed deadlines or gaps in service.

How It Works

  1. Get in touch for a free switch-over consultation.
  2. We gather your existing records and set up your Hayes Lee portal.
  3. Our team imports your data and runs a parallel check.
  4. You sign off; we go live—no downtime.
